Are you apple-shaped, pear-shaped, or a classic hourglass? Each shape has styles that flatter it best, so take some time to identify yours. Step 2: Determine the Right Style for the Occasion Next, think about where you&#8217;re going. Is it a casual lunch date, a formal wedding, or a fun night out? Total estimated delivery time is 2–4 business days. How long does delivery take for made-to-order items? + Made-to-order items require 6–7 business days for preparation before shipment, followed by 1–3 business days for delivery. Role of Styliiiish Styliiiish operates as a marketplace intermediary, not the original owner of user-listed dresses.
